column5: Do I need and outdoor card to pick blueberrys?
you do not need anything but alot of bug spray to go berry picking. have fun. I really enjoy picking berries every summer.
Perhaps Bear Spray??? Bears like berrys too!
Yeah bug spray and I suggect some track shoes. They don't have to be real fast shoes, just faster than what your companions are wearing! Bill Krejca
I just hope some official isn't reading this & seeing another way to make more revenue!!! Later, Jay

In what month do you plan on going Blueberry picking? I have been going to Ontario (Ignace area) around the last week in August and found acre upon acre of berries, usually in areas that had been clear cut 3-4 years previously. Summer weather has an effect on when they are at their peak.
Yep, August is the best time to go. Berries need lots of water through the summer, so the more rain we get the more and bigger berries there are.

We're just across the border, but ours go from the middle of July to the middle of August. If you run across a bear, just put down the berries and slowly back away! Nobody'll get hurt! LOL That's all they want at that time of year.
Jared, I'm afraid if I back away, I'll be slipping! Bill Krejca
